title: Archive: USSR v Netherlands - Euro 1988
body_text:
Archive: USSR v Netherlands - Euro 1988

There was an error
Relive Holland's victory in the final of Euro 1988 with a first half goal from Ruud Gullit and Marco van Basten's famous volley sealing the win.
Watch Uefa Euro 2020 next summer across the BBC.
